name: Professional Pay-As-You-Use
shortDescription: Get all the private banking perks you deserve. A monthly maintenance fee applies, then only pay for the transactions you use.
description: A private banking experience that emphasises convenience, quality and flexibility on a pay as you use basis.
additionalInfo: Included~Dedicated relationship banker for you and your household, supported by a dedicated credit team and with access to investment, global-banking and wealth specialists
Included~Nedbank Money app or Online Banking for worldclass secure digital banking
Optional~Professional cheque and credit cards offering local and international perks
salesHighlights: sh1~A banking package that works as hard as you do
sh2~Lifestyle perks for the entire family
sh3~Unique investments to suit your lifestyle
sh4~Finance that lets you dream big
sh5~Ways to bank that suit your hours
sh6~Tailored offering for young professionals and those over 54

applicationSteps.name: Authenticate
applicationSteps.Description: Register to log in with your Nedbank ID.

applicationSteps.name: Product setup
applicationSteps.Description: Setup your product to suit your needs.

applicationSteps.name: About you
applicationSteps.Description: Tell us more details about you.

applicationSteps.name: Credit info
applicationSteps.Description: Only required if you need a credit facility.

applicationSteps.name: Customisation
applicationSteps.Description: Choose your banker and card delivery.

applicationSteps.name: Finalisation
applicationSteps.Description: Upload documents and accept some T&Cs.

valueAddedServices: Dedicated relationship banker for you and your household, supported by a dedicated credit team and with access to investment, global-banking and wealth specialists
Nedbank Money app or Online Banking for world-class secure access to your account wherever you are
Optional: Professional cheque cards offering local and international perks
Optional: Professional credit cards offering local and international travel perks

eligibilityRules.description: Individuals over the age of 18 years
There is no minimum income requirement, however this offering is recommended for those earning from R750,000 per annum
Not available to trust, companies or legal entities
All credit facilities are subject to credit and affordability checks

requiredDocuments.description: card/document or passport with valid permit
(we can source these for you from most banks)
for overdraft and credit card applications, additional documents may be required

productFeatures.name: Age
productFeatures.description: Individuals over the age of 18 years

productFeatures.name: Income
productFeatures.description: No minimum income is required however, this offering is ideally suited to those earning over R750 000 per year.

productFeatures.name: AirtimewithoutAirtime
productFeatures.description: Airtime without Airtime (purchase airtime without having airtime using *130*001#)

productFeatures.name: SendiMali
productFeatures.description: Send i-Mali (Send money to a cellphone number using *120*001#)

productFeatures.name: Chargecard
productFeatures.description: American ExpressÂ® Platinum Charge Card available at 50% discounted annual fee (for the first year only)

productFeatures.name: Internationalairportloungeaccess
productFeatures.description: Ten visits per annum. One guest per visit

productFeatures.name: Domesticairportloungeaccess
productFeatures.description: Unlimited access to Bidvest domestic and international lounges

productFeatures.name: Forexdelivery
productFeatures.description: Free forex delivery (foreign cash & travel card) at preferential rates

productFeatures.name: Insurance
productFeatures.description: Travel insurance, purchase protection and warrantees included when paying with your Visa Signature Professional Banking Credit Card.

productFeatures.name: Tailoredfinancing
productFeatures.description: Tailored financing: With the support of your dedicated relationship banker, credit decisions are personalised to your unique circumstances and you can get: 100% loans for home loan applications of less than R1,5 million and 100% loans for vehicle finance applications of less than R400 000.  All credit applications are subject to final credit approval and terms and conditions.
